verses.verse: The beginning<WG746> of the Good News<WG2098> of Jesus<WG2424> Christ,<WG5547> the Son<WG5207> of God.<WG2316>

As<WG5613> it is written<WG1125> in<WG1722> the prophets,<WG4396> "Behold,<WG2400> I<WG1473> send<WG649> my<WG3450> messenger<WG32> before<WG4253> your<WG4675> face,<WG4383> who<WG3739> will prepare<WG2680> your<WG4675> way<WG3598> before<WG1715> you.<WG4675>
The voice<WG5456> of one crying<WG994> in<WG1722> the wilderness,<WG2048> <WG4160> 'Make ready the way<WG3598> of the Lord!<WG2962> Make<WG4160> his<WG846> paths<WG5147> straight!<WG2117>'"
<WG2491> came<WG1096> baptizing<WG907> in<WG1722> the wilderness<WG2048> and<WG2532> preaching<WG2784> the baptism<WG908> of repentance<WG3341> for<WG1519> forgiveness<WG859> of sins.<WG266>

All<WG3956> the country<WG5561> of Judea<WG2449> and<WG2532> all those of Jerusalem<WG2415> went out<WG1607> to<WG4314> him.<WG846> They<WG2532> were<WG907> baptized<WG907> by<WG5259> him<WG846> in<WG1722> the Jordan<WG2446> river,<WG4215> confessing<WG1843> their<WG846> sins.<WG266>

<WG1161> John<WG2491> was<WG2258> clothed with<WG1746> camel<WG2574>'s hair<WG2359> and<WG1161> a leather<WG1193> belt<WG2223> around<WG4012> his<WG846> waist.<WG3751> <WG2532> He ate<WG2068> locusts<WG200> and<WG2532> wild<WG66> honey.<WG3192>

<WG2532> He preached,<WG2784> saying,<WG3004> "After<WG3694> me<WG3450> comes<WG2064> he who is mightier than<WG2478> I,<WG3450> the thong<WG2438> of whose<WG3739> sandals<WG5266> I am<WG1510> not<WG3756> worthy<WG2425> to<WG3089> stoop down<WG2955> and loosen.<WG3089>
I<WG1473><WG99999> baptized<WG907> you<WG5209> in<WG1473> water,<WG5204> but<WG1161> he<WG846> will baptize<WG907> you<WG5209> in<WG1722> the<WG4151> Holy<WG40> Spirit.<WG4151>"

<WG2532> It happened<WG1096> in<WG1722> those<WG1565> days,<WG2250> that Jesus<WG2424> came<WG2064> from<WG575> Nazareth<WG3478> of Galilee,<WG1056> and<WG2532> was baptized<WG907> by<WG5259> John<WG2491> in<WG1519> the Jordan.<WG2446>

<WG2532> Immediately<WG2112> coming up<WG305> from<WG575> the water,<WG5204> he saw<WG1492> the heavens<WG3772> parting,<WG4977> and<WG2532> the Spirit<WG4151> descending<WG2597> on<WG1909> him<WG846> like<WG5616> a dove.<WG4058>
A<WG2532> voice<WG5456> came<WG1096> out of<WG1537> the sky,<WG3772> "You<WG4771> are<WG1488> my<WG3450> beloved<WG27> Son,<WG5207> in<WG1722> whom<WG3739> I am well pleased.<WG2106>"
<WG2532> Immediately<WG2117> the Spirit<WG4151> drove<WG1544> him<WG846> out into<WG1519> the wilderness.<WG2048>

<WG2532> He was<WG2258> there<WG1563> in<WG1722> the wilderness<WG2048> forty<WG5062> days<WG2250> tempted<WG3985> by<WG5259> Satan.<WG4567> <WG2532> He was<WG2258> with<WG3326> the wild animals;<WG2342> and<WG2532> the angels<WG32> were serving<WG1247> him.<WG846>

Now<WG1161> after<WG3326> John<WG2491> was taken into custody,<WG3860> Jesus<WG2424> came<WG2064> into<WG1519> Galilee,<WG1056> preaching<WG2784> the Good News<WG2098> of the Kingdom<WG932> of God,<WG2316>

and<WG2532> saying,<WG3004> "The time<WG2540> is fulfilled,<WG4137> and<WG2532> the Kingdom<WG932> of God<WG2316> is at hand!<WG1448> Repent,<WG3340> and<WG2532> believe<WG4100> in the Good News.<WG1722>"

<WG1161> Passing<WG4043> along by<WG3844> the sea<WG2281> of Galilee,<WG1056> he saw<WG1492> Simon<WG4613> and<WG2532> Andrew<WG406> the<WG846> brother<WG80> of Simon casting<WG906> a net<WG293> into<WG1722> the sea,<WG2281> for<WG1063> they were<WG2258> fishermen.<WG231>
<WG2532> Jesus<WG2424> said<WG2036> to them,<WG846> "Come<WG1205> after<WG3694> me,<WG3450> and<WG2532> I will make<WG4160> you<WG1205> into<WG1096> fishers<WG231> for men.<WG444>"
Immediately<WG2112> they left<WG863> their<WG846> nets,<WG1350> and<WG2532> followed<WG190> him.<WG846>

<WG2532> Going<WG4260> on a little further<WG3641> from there,<WG1564> he saw<WG1492> James<WG2385> the son of Zebedee,<WG2199> and<WG2532> John,<WG2491> his<WG846> brother,<WG80> who<WG846> were<WG846> also<WG2532> in<WG1722> the boat<WG4143> mending<WG2675> the nets.<WG1350>

<WG2532> Immediately<WG2112> he called<WG2564> them,<WG846> and<WG2532> they left<WG863> their<WG846> father,<WG3962> Zebedee,<WG2199> in<WG1722> the boat<WG4143> with<WG3326> the hired servants,<WG3411> and went<WG565> after<WG3694> him.<WG846>
<WG2532> They went<WG1531> into<WG1519> Capernaum,<WG2584> and<WG2532> immediately<WG2112> on the Sabbath day<WG4521> he entered<WG1525> into<WG1519> the synagogue<WG4864> and taught.<WG1321>

<WG2532> They were astonished<WG1605> at<WG1909> his<WG846> teaching,<WG1322> for<WG1063> he<WG2258> taught<WG1321> <WG2258> them<WG846> as<WG5613> having<WG2192> authority,<WG1849> and<WG2532> not<WG3756> as<WG5613> the scribes.<WG1122>
<WG2532> Immediately there was<WG2258> in<WG1722> their<WG846> synagogue<WG4864> a man<WG444> with<WG1722> an unclean<WG169> spirit,<WG4151> and<WG2532> he cried out,<WG349>

saying,<WG3004> "Ha!<WG1436> What do we have<WG5101> to do<WG2254> with<WG2532> you,<WG4671> Jesus,<WG2424> you Nazarene?<WG3479> Have you come<WG2064> to destroy<WG622> us?<WG2248> I know<WG1492> you<WG4571> who<WG5101> you are:<WG1488> the Holy One<WG40> of God!<WG2316>"
<WG2532> Jesus<WG2424> rebuked<WG2008> him,<WG846> saying,<WG3004> "Be quiet,<WG5392> and<WG2532> come out<WG1831> of<WG1537> him!<WG846>"
<WG2532> The<WG4682> unclean<WG169> spirit,<WG4151> convulsing<WG4682> him<WG846> and<WG2532> crying<WG2896> with a loud<WG3173> voice,<WG5456> came out<WG1831> of<WG1537> him.<WG846>

<WG2532> They were<WG2284> all<WG3956> amazed,<WG2284> so that<WG5620> they questioned<WG4802> among<WG4314> themselves,<WG846> saying,<WG3004> "What<WG5101> is<WG2076> this?<WG5124> A<WG5101> new<WG2537> teaching?<WG1322> <WG3778> For<WG3754> with<WG2596> authority<WG1849> he commands<WG2004> even<WG2532> the unclean<WG169> spirits,<WG4151> and<WG2532> they obey<WG5219> him!<WG846>"
<WG1161> The report<WG189> of him<WG846> went out<WG1831> immediately<WG2117> everywhere<WG1519> into all<WG3650> the region of Galilee<WG1056> and its surrounding area.<WG4066>

<WG2532> Immediately,<WG2112> when they had come out<WG1831> of<WG1537> the synagogue,<WG4864> they came<WG2064> into<WG1519> the house<WG3614> of Simon<WG4613> and<WG2532> Andrew,<WG406> with<WG3326> James<WG2385> and<WG2532> John.<WG2491>
Now<WG1161> Simon<WG4613>'s wife<WG3994>'s mother lay<WG2621> sick with a fever,<WG4445> and<WG2532> immediately<WG2112> they told<WG3004> him<WG846> about<WG4012> her.<WG846>

<WG2532> He came<WG4334> and took<WG2902> her<WG846> by the hand,<WG5495> and raised<WG1453> her<WG846> up.<WG1453> <WG2532> <WG2112> The fever<WG4446> left<WG863> her,<WG846> and<WG2532> she served<WG1247> them.<WG846>

<WG1161> At evening,<WG3798> when<WG3753> the sun<WG2246> had<WG1096> set,<WG1416> they brought<WG5342> to<WG4314> him<WG846> all<WG3956> who were<WG2192> sick,<WG2560> and<WG2532> those<WG3588> who were possessed by demons.<WG1139>
<WG2532> All<WG3650> the city<WG4172> was<WG2258> gathered together<WG1996> at<WG4314> the door.<WG2374>

<WG2532> He healed<WG2323> many<WG4183> who were<WG2192> sick<WG2560> with various<WG4164> diseases,<WG3554> and<WG2532> cast out<WG1544> many<WG4183> demons.<WG1140> <WG2532> He didn't<WG3756> allow<WG863> the demons<WG1140> to speak,<WG2980> because<WG3754> they knew<WG1492> him.<WG846>

<WG2532> Early in the morning,<WG4404> while<WG3029> it was still dark,<WG1773> he rose up<WG450> and went out,<WG1831> and<WG2532> departed<WG565> into<WG1519> a deserted<WG2048> place,<WG5117> and prayed<WG4336> there.<WG2546>
<WG2532> Simon<WG4613> and<WG2532> those who were<WG3588> with<WG3326> him<WG846> followed after<WG2614> him;<WG846>
and<WG2532> they found<WG2147> him,<WG846> and told<WG3004> him,<WG846> "Everyone<WG3956> is looking for<WG2212> you.<WG3754>"

<WG2532> He said<WG3004> to them,<WG846> "Let<WG71>'s go elsewhere into<WG1519> the next<WG2192> towns,<WG2969> that<WG2443> I may preach<WG2784> there also,<WG2546> because I came out<WG1831> for<WG1063> this reason.<WG5124>"
<WG2532> He<WG2258> went into<WG1722> their<WG846> synagogues<WG4864> throughout<WG1519> all<WG3650> Galilee,<WG1056> preaching<WG2784> and<WG2532> casting out<WG1544> demons.<WG1140>

<WG2532> A leper<WG3015> came<WG2064> to<WG4314> him,<WG846> begging<WG3870> him,<WG846> <WG2532> kneeling down<WG1120> to him,<WG846> and<WG2532> saying<WG3004> to him,<WG846> "If<WG1437> you want<WG2309> to,<WG1410> you can make me<WG3165> clean.<WG3754>"

<WG1161> Being moved with compassion,<WG4697> he stretched out<WG1614> his hand,<WG5495> and<WG2532> touched<WG680> him,<WG846> and<WG2532> said<WG3004> to him,<WG846> "I want<WG2309> to.<WG2511> Be made clean."
<WG2532> When he<WG846> had said<WG2036> this,<WG2112> immediately the leprosy<WG3014> departed<WG565> from<WG575> him,<WG846> and<WG2532> he was made clean.<WG2511>
<WG2532> He strictly warned<WG1690> him,<WG846> and<WG1690> immediately<WG2112> sent<WG1544> him<WG846> out,<WG1544>

and<WG2532> said<WG3004> to him,<WG846> "See<WG3708> you say<WG2036> nothing<WG3367> to anybody,<WG3367> but<WG235> go<WG5217> show<WG1166> yourself<WG4572> to the priest,<WG2409> and<WG2532> offer<WG4374> for<WG4012> your<WG4675> cleansing<WG2512> the things which<WG3739> Moses<WG3475> commanded,<WG4367> for<WG1519> a testimony<WG3142> to them.<WG846>"

But<WG1161> he went out,<WG1831> and<WG2532> began<WG756> to proclaim<WG2784> it much,<WG4183> and<WG2532> to spread about<WG1310> the matter,<WG3056> so that<WG5620> Jesus<WG846> could<WG1410> no more<WG3371> openly<WG5320> enter<WG1525> into<WG1519> a city,<WG4172> but<WG235> was<WG2258> outside<WG1854> in<WG1722> desert<WG2048> places:<WG5117> and<WG2532> they came<WG2064> to<WG4314> him from everywhere.<WG846>
